comments: Born: 20 Jan 1911, Died: 1 Feb 2010; wife of Alberto Castellanos
examples: Opuntia schulzii A. Castellanos & H.V. Lelong in Lilloa, 10: 400 (1944). Opuntia weberi var. dispar A. Castellanos & H.V. Lelong in Jahrb. Deutsch. Kakt.-Ges., 1: 51 (1935).
source: IK db.; Dates (birth & death) and Forenames from Heloisa Castellanos, daughter of H.V. Lelong and A. Castellanos (via Daniel Schweich)
